description.narrative: The development objective of the proposed project would be to assist Bulgaria to reduce road transport costs by improving the condition and quality of its roads network during the first years of EU accession.

title.narrative: Updating of road data for Class II roads (% of total length per year)

comment.narrative: The figure is as of August 30. The target will be achieved by the end of 2012.

title.narrative: Updating of road data for Class III roads (% of total length per year)

comment.narrative: road data collected only on recently rehabilitated road sections.

title.narrative: Updating of road data for Class I roads (% of total length per year)
Works (W), Goods (G), and Consulting Services (CS) contracts processed and managed by Management Consultant
Number of kilometers of Class I roads rehabilitated under the Project
Number of kilometers of Class II roads rehabilitated under the Project
Number of kilometers of Class III roads rehabilitated under the Project
Consultant and advisory services for road sector management

comment.narrative: Final number of staff-months is likely to be 18 months until the project closing date - June 30, 2012.
Contract signed and consultant in place

title.narrative: Consultant services for project management support for operational programs provided

comment.narrative: Services provided by Jaspers still in progress.

title.narrative: Training received by NRIF staff from management Consultant (in staff-hours)
Percentage of improved Class III roads initially in poor condition, measured in IRI (International Road Roughness Index) - cumulative values
Capacity of NRIF to manage road maintenance: number of area-wide maintenance contracts prepared
Percentage of improved Class II roads initially in poor condition, measured in IRI (International Road Roughness Index) - cumulative values
Percentage of improved Class I roads initially in poor condition, measured in IRI (International Road Roughness Index) - cumulativevalues
Vehicle Operating Cost on roads to be rehabilitated under the Project (Average, 2005 EUR per vehicle-kilometer)
Studies on institutional set up, human resources and development of competencies in the sector carried out

comment.narrative: Institutional assessment study of RIA carried out.

title.narrative: Road safety strategy and plans prepared

comment.narrative: Review of Road Safety Management Capacity completed. Action Plans prepared but only partially implemented.

title.narrative: Implementation and Effective use of Road Management System by NRIF
Project management manuals reviewed, finalized and in use
Rolling Multi-year road maintenance and rehabilitation program established
